comments.body:
Please add the `license_file`. Preferably it would come from the source distribution, but if not you can manually package it as described in:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

It might be good to raise an issue upstream to have it included in the source distribution and put a link to the issue url as a comment in this recipe so that if it is included in a future release, there is a visual indicator to remind you to check for future releases of the conda-forge package.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@  home: http://github.com/h5io/h5io
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE.txt'
  summary: 'Python Objects Onto HDF5'
